txt.en: 'Three cheers for Captain Brackenbrook! About time somebody took charge around here.'
'You with the garrison? They need all the hands they can get.'
'They say there's a dwarf at the Hunters Lodge. I ain't never seen a dwarf before....'
'Brackenbrook will deal with the brigands. We don't need no help from that Amdir...half-dead anyways.'
'Rangers don't get a warm welcome in Archet. The Captain's a bit suspicious of 'em.'
'Those brigands have raided every farmstead from here to Bree. It's time we stood up to 'em!'
